title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki - XWiki

09:54 <venkatesh> has quit  
09:57 <vmassol> btw guys anca and i have found a big problem in the master, related to events. Basically any time you update/add/delete an xobject all the plugins are re-initialized. I've pinged thomas on skype (since comes from a recent modification he did). This is what makes the watchist test flicker (because of a concurrency with plugin reinit which makes the watchlist plugin not defined under some condition)
